content: attaching crochet wheels only sew the the fpsc single_crochet x 10 into the remaining st s of round 6 25 top half of the wheel to the car otherwise your wheels will curve 8 single_crochet x 4 this will bring you to the top of the window in under the car working into the blo single_crochet x 7 across the top of the window finally embroider any optional extras like windscreen wipers working through both loops for the rest of the round single_crochet x 14 25 9-11 single_crochet x 25 25 6
